name: V.P.S.C (Very.Particular.Space.Citizen) #1 – Michel Karbaj
description: [V.P.S.C (Very.Particular.Space.Citizen) #1 – Michel Karbaj]   Portrait of a very particular Space Citizen.  This one is Michel Karbaj. this person, despite of his appearance, has a position with big responsibilities , and no one understands how he got there. Michel either.   128 frames 3D animation loop by @Mosieur_Costard
